definition: Fangshan county in Lüliang 呂梁|吕梁[Lu:3 liang2], Shanxi 山西

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: According to the research results, some sustainable developmental countermeasures are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 根據研究結果，對方山縣現狀及今後的發展提出建議。
